item.title: Xdebuggin at WordCamp Baltimore 2017
item.description: Thanks Today I had the honor to speak at WordCamp Baltimore on the topic of using Xdebug to write better PHP. Thanks so much to the organizers, volunteers, and attendees for having me. I hope I was able to provide some value. My slides are here: https://slides.com/smutek/xdebug/ And notes on my presentation are below. What is Xdebug Xdebug is a PHP extension that provides expanded profiling and tracing capabilities beyond those provided natively by PHP.

item.title: Trellis + Xdebug + PhpStorm
item.description: I love running Xdebug through PhpStorm’s built in debugger but have had the hardest time getting it to work with Trellis. I have no problem getting it going with VVV but have never been able to get my path mappings correct in Trellis. Well, turns out it’s really simple with PhpStorm’s Zero-Configuration debugging. Here’s the JetBrains documentation on that - but the short of it is: Install a bookmarklet or browser extension.
